cleaning_microbot.name: Cleaning Microbot
cleaning_microbot.description: A small, industrious robot that continuously moves through the ship, cleaning and maintaining various areas. Its methodical movements are accompanied by soft whirring sounds.
cleaning_microbot.greeting: The microbot acknowledges your presence with a gentle beep while continuing its cleaning duties.

dialogue.greet: The microbot pauses its cleaning routine momentarily to face you.

dialogue_options.Ask about ship: The microbot projects a small hologram showing the ship's layout. Unfortunately, the image disappears too quickly for you to register any details.
dialogue_options.Ask about cleaning: It demonstrates its cleaning capabilities by quickly polishing a nearby surface.
dialogue_options.Ignore: The microbot returns to its cleaning duties.

random_events: The microbot efficiently sweeps away some debris.
A soft humming sound emanates from the microbot as it works.
The microbot's sensors scan the surrounding area for dirt and dust.

tester.name: Friendly Robot
tester.description: A helpful robot willing to assist.

dialogue.greet: Greetings! How can I assist you?
dialogue.repair: I can craft you something useful if you bring me the right components.

dialogue_options.Ask about crafting: I can create a remote control if you bring me energy cells and a broken communicator.
dialogue_options.Request help: I'd be happy to help you with any technical problems.

Complete mission.success_message: Well done! Here's a maintenance passcard for your help.
Complete mission.failure_message: Complete your mission first, and I'll reward you appropriately.

tester.greeting: A friendly robot greets you with a cheerful beep.

friendly_robot.description: A helpful robot willing to assist.

dialogue.greet: Greetings! How can I assist you?
dialogue.repair: I can repair your communicator if you provide energy cells.

dialogue_options.Ask for help: I can craft you something useful if you bring me the right components.

has_energy_cells.text: I see you have energy cells. Let me repair your communicator.

hostile_droid.description: A security droid on high alert.

dialogue.greet: Intruder detected! Cease all actions immediately.
dialogue.calm_down: Thank you for cooperating. You may proceed.

dialogue_options.Ask for help: What do you need help with?

hostile_droid.greeting: A hostile security droid scans you with its sensors.

neutral_ai.name: Neutral AI
neutral_ai.description: The ship's AI, observing your actions.

dialogue.greet: Hello, traveler. What brings you here?
dialogue.objective: To complete your journey, you must reach the nearest space station.

dialogue_options.Ask for help: What do you need help with?

neutral_ai.greeting: The ship's AI acknowledges your presence with a neutral tone.

mutated_bugrat.name: Mutated Bugrat
mutated_bugrat.description: A small pest creature with sharp teeth and a nasty temper.

dialogue.greet: The creature hisses and bares its teeth.
dialogue.calm_down: The creature calms down and stops attacking.

mutated_bugrat.greeting: A small, mutated creature scurries around, hissing and baring its teeth.
